Text:
Many thanks, yet again a set of albums I have never heard.
Appreciated. Be well. T.

I have a crazy request sir ,  I don't suppose you have a good copy of Fruits of Passion , the name of the album is Fruits of Passion , I can find it on lots of places but the problem is it's very low quality , I think its round about 46 mb and barely 128kbps , so it's  total rubbish .

If you can do this , you will go from legend to a god .

Hi steevo-be-thy-name, it's not a problem at all and will post it for you. but I will be away from home for two weeks, so once I am back, I'll get the record, clean it and post a high quality mp3 here. cheers

The Get Smart! album is a real punk rock gem.
World without End and Room with a View are, in my opinion, anthology songs in punk rock terms. 
Thanks once again for these wonderful discoveries.
Cheers.
